text: Nikolay Vasilyev (Russian: Николай Васильев; born 2 April 1952) is a Soviet rower. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich with the men's coxless pair where they came eighths. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Nikolay Vasilyev (rower)
